name: Face with Tears of Joy
baseMeaning: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and tears streaming from closed eyes.
tldr: The classic 'LOL' emoji - shows something is hilarious. Seen as outdated by Gen Z.

contextMeanings.meaning: Something is genuinely funny, laughing hard.
Can indicate mocking or laughing at someone rather than with them.

contextMeanings.meaning: Gen Z may use it ironically to seem uncool on purpose.

platformNotes.note: Still widely used by older demographics in comments and DMs.
Often used ironically or to appear older/uncool intentionally.
Very common in family group chats and among older users.

Still use regularly to express laughter, though aware of Gen Z opinions.
The default emoji for anything funny. Use liberally.

warnings.title: Age marker
